entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
